UniprotID	Q14457
Accession	Q14457;B2R6N7;O75595;Q9UNA8
EntryName	BECN1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Beclin-1 (Coiled-coil myosin-like BCL2-interacting protein) (Protein GT197) [Cleaved into: Beclin-1-C 35 kDa; Beclin-1-C 37 kDa]
GeneName	BECN1 GT197
Length	450
Function	Plays a central role in autophagy (PubMed:18570871, PubMed:21358617, PubMed:23184933, PubMed:23974797, PubMed:25484083, PubMed:28445460, PubMed:37776275). Acts as a core subunit of the PI3K complex that mediates formation of phosphatidylinositol 3-phosphate; different complex forms are believed to play a role in multiple membrane trafficking pathways: PI3KC3-C1 is involved in initiation of autophagosomes and PI3KC3-C2 in maturation of autophagosomes and endocytosis. Involved in regulation of degradative endocytic trafficking and required for the abscission step in cytokinesis, probably in the context of PI3KC3-C2 (PubMed:20208530, PubMed:20643123, PubMed:23974797, PubMed:26783301). Essential for the formation of PI3KC3-C2 but not PI3KC3-C1 PI3K complex forms. Involved in endocytosis (PubMed:25275521). May play a role in antiviral host defense.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Golgi apparatus; trans-Golgi network membrane; Endosome membrane; Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Mitochondrion membrane; Endosome; Cytoplasmic vesicle; Autophagosome; Mitochondrion; Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Mitochondrion
Disorder	0.8828,0.8596,0.8713,0.7982,0.8013,0.6806,0.6136,0.5211,0.5493,0.5620,0.4901,0.5055,0.4979,0.5296,0.4652,0.4652,0.3983,0.4119,0.4087,0.3983,0.3182,0.3053,0.2575,0.1942,0.2503,0.2503,0.2783,0.3249,0.3392,0.3392,0.3566,0.3704,0.3740,0.3460,0.3460,0.3494,0.3019,0.3631,0.3529,0.3321,0.3392,0.4017,0.3983,0.4979,0.5707,0.5807,0.5807,0.6620,0.6851,0.7843,0.7951,0.7755,0.8462,0.8421,0.8655,0.8462,0.9057,0.9562,0.9126,0.8655,0.8920,0.8872,0.9230,0.9269,0.9081,0.9151,0.9039,0.8655,0.8596,0.8313,0.8050,0.6851,0.5992,0.6427,0.6948,0.6661,0.6322,0.5901,0.5296,0.6375,0.7250,0.7250,0.7250,0.6531,0.6712,0.6620,0.5382,0.5382,0.5254,0.4582,0.4685,0.4940,0.5665,0.6531,0.6183,0.5707,0.5992,0.6136,0.6136,0.6576,0.6712,0.5758,0.5533,0.5419,0.5493,0.4685,0.4541,0.4831,0.4864,0.5577,0.6620,0.5758,0.4619,0.4940,0.4256,0.4017,0.3983,0.4017,0.4017,0.4220,0.4186,0.3566,0.4409,0.4476,0.4979,0.4476,0.4292,0.4652,0.5419,0.4507,0.4541,0.4541,0.5296,0.5577,0.4766,0.5758,0.5951,0.5211,0.5382,0.5419,0.5382,0.4582,0.5254,0.4507,0.4507,0.4292,0.5017,0.6227,0.5017,0.4864,0.5951,0.5098,0.4766,0.4507,0.4292,0.4256,0.4220,0.3529,0.3460,0.3460,0.3392,0.3215,0.3872,0.3948,0.4582,0.4652,0.4476,0.4541,0.4409,0.4541,0.4541,0.4220,0.5055,0.4541,0.4541,0.5620,0.5577,0.5176,0.5176,0.6136,0.6136,0.6322,0.6375,0.5342,0.4441,0.4330,0.4330,0.3631,0.3631,0.3740,0.3807,0.3910,0.3983,0.3948,0.4441,0.4441,0.3529,0.3631,0.3631,0.4409,0.4369,0.3494,0.3494,0.3494,0.3529,0.4256,0.4017,0.4017,0.4507,0.4507,0.4256,0.4119,0.4087,0.4220,0.4256,0.4541,0.4476,0.5254,0.5055,0.5296,0.4979,0.4979,0.4979,0.4801,0.5055,0.4685,0.4582,0.4652,0.4507,0.4725,0.3807,0.4087,0.4051,0.4051,0.4149,0.4119,0.3249,0.3392,0.3356,0.3460,0.3566,0.3840,0.3704,0.4186,0.4087,0.3215,0.3983,0.4087,0.4256,0.4292,0.3494,0.4330,0.4149,0.4119,0.3910,0.3740,0.3667,0.4541,0.3983,0.2988,0.3740,0.3392,0.3286,0.2224,0.2503,0.1791,0.1501,0.1731,0.1671,0.1643,0.1643,0.1399,0.1323,0.1399,0.1349,0.1501,0.1671,0.0909,0.0780,0.0704,0.1298,0.1162,0.0817,0.0948,0.1
